snippet.title: Tidy Cauldron Trailer
snippet.description:
Help 3 messy witches tidy up their chaos! Arrange mystical ingredients through 100 handcrafted puzzles in this relaxing organization adventure.

▶ Wishlist on Steam and play the demo now
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2708320/Tidy_Cauldron/

▶ Also available on itch.io
https://purringcampfire.itch.io/tidy-cauldron

▶ Keep updated on our games
Itch.io: https://purringcampfire.itch.io/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PurringCampfire


Trailer music: Escape Room Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/


#TidyCauldron #gamedevelopment
